message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $9500. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8200. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, and I'm willing to work with you. However, $8200 is just too low for me.  How about we split the difference and I come down to $8800? This still gives you a good price while allowing me to cover my costs.

I appreciate your willingness to work with me, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8000. I've already found another seller who is willing to sell it to me for this price, so I'm not sure I can go any higher than this.
